SEARCH
Package Controller

Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
Controller.MainMenuController
public class MainMenuController extends Object
Controller responsible for handling the main menu interactions in the application. It coordinates actions between the view and the student list controller.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Adrian Reszka

  • Constructor Details

    • MainMenuController

      public MainMenuController(StudentListController studentListController, MainMenuView menuView)
      Constructor for MainMenuController. Initializes the scanners, view, model, and student list controller.
      Parameters:
      studentListController - The controller managing student-related operations.
      menuView - The view responsible for displaying the main menu.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the main menu loop. It repeatedly shows the menu, gets the user's choice, and invokes the corresponding action based on the selection.

    • getMenuChoice

      public int getMenuChoice()
      Gets the user's menu choice as an integer.
      Returns:
      The chosen menu option as an integer.

    • getStudentIdInput

      public int getStudentIdInput()
      Captures the student ID input from the user.
      Returns:
      The entered student ID as an integer.

    • getStudentNameInput

      public String getStudentNameInput()
      Captures the student name input from the user.
      Returns:
      The entered student name as a string.

    • getStudentSurnameInput

      public String getStudentSurnameInput()
      Captures the student surname input from the user.
      Returns:
      The entered student surname as a string.

    • getGradeInput

      public String getGradeInput()
      Captures the grade input from the user.
      Returns:
      The entered grade value as a string.

    • getTeacherInput

      public String getTeacherInput()
      Captures the teacher's name input from the user.
      Returns:
      The entered teacher name as a string.

    • getSubjectInput

      public String getSubjectInput()
      Captures the subject name input from the user.
      Returns:
      The entered subject name as a string.

    • getGradeIndexInput

      public int getGradeIndexInput()
      Captures the grade index input for removal or editing from the user.
      Returns:
      The entered grade index as an integer (1-based index).

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent()
      Adds a new student using inputs from the view.

      Adds a grade to an existing student using inputs from the view.

      Removes a student based on the provided ID.
